short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Extension to hide any text on any website for more privacy while streaming / sharing your screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you sharing your stream to a large audience on streaming sites? or maybe you are just screen sharing on your favorite chatting platform. In both cases you may want to hide some private information like your full legal name on websites.
This extensions tries to achieve thtat exact thing by allowing you to censor any text on any website.

Disclaimer:
Due to it being still in development there might be some bugs or inconsistencies.
